titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 2470) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide protection against catastrophic medical expenses under the medicare program, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-663.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 269 - 129 (Record Vote No: 163).

bill.summary: 6/1/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 2470 (Medicare catastrophic expense coverage) and against its consideration.
